Package ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake.Snake
public class Snake extends Object
Represents the snake in the game. Maintains the snake's body, direction, and provides methods for movement and collision detection.

    • getBody

      public Deque<Point> getBody()

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(Direction newDirection)
      Sets the snake's direction. If the new direction is directly opposite to the current direction, the change is ignored.
      Parameters:
      newDirection - the new direction to set

    • move

      public Point move(boolean grow)
      Moves the snake in the current direction. If the 'grow' flag is true, the snake grows by not removing the tail.
      Parameters:
      grow - if true, the snake grows after moving
      Returns:
      the new head position after the move

    • checkSelfCollision

      public boolean checkSelfCollision()
      Checks if the snake has collided with itself.
      Returns:
      true if the snake's head collides with any other part of its body, false otherwise

    • length

      public int length()
